title: A New XCOM Game is Coming Next Week - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.14.20
description:
Blessing and Imran talk about the newly announced XCOM: Chimera Squad coming next week. 

Time Stamps - 
00:06:14 - Housekeeping
PSILY episode 15 is live
Kevin got a bug bite
Greg is streaming the Division 2 tomorrow
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Al Tribesman, & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:10:20 - There’s a new XCOM game! And it’s coming NEXT WEEK - 2K Release
00:16:30 - Star Fox & Team Fortress Voice Actor, Rick May, Has Died From Covid-19 - Luke Plunkett @ Kotaku
00:20:00 -  WWE 2K21 reportedly has been cancelled in favour of a new game - James Batchelor @ GIBiz
00:26:38 - With an already tarnished record, with 2K20s release last year, will not putting out a 2K21 hurt the developers reputation even further? - Best Friends Q:Frankfurtter
00:29:43 - Switch’s new 10.0 update is live - Richard Lawler @ Engadget
00:33:24 - PlayStation announces their Play At Home Initiative - Jim Ryan, President & CEO, Sony Interactive Entertainment @ PS Blog
00:41:00 - There’s a new trailer for The Dark Pictures Anthology: Little Hope
@TheDarkPictures on Twitter:
00:47:30 -  Hims
00:49:00 - quip
00:50:08 - Out today
Reader mail   -
00:53:17 - Over the weekend CD Projekt Red announced that Cyberpunk will receive a Witcher 3 sized DLC expansion eventually and I just wanna know, how much content is too much content? - The Nano Biologist
00:59:30 - Squad Up:JChicago(PS4) - justWONmore
01:00:30 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Gary
